title: 14 Days Ban Appeal
body:
So i got banned for 14 days. I feel this is a little excessive as i hardly talked all game. I was under immense pressure as i was playing a ranked game into my promos. Also with the factor of multiple negative, frustrating hate speech from fellow team mates. I did not give up and pursued to play the game to the best of my ability even though my team was making me feel extremely bad and useless. I have reviewed my inappropriate actions of using harmful words to affect others and will next time think before i act. Also i feel like most my reports were due to my bad score, as there wasn't much conversation throughout the game.

Please accept my apologies as I have come to realisation of how i need to act in future games.
Thanks Heaps Cakejohns

He woulden't have given a damn if he wasn't banned, i understand that its the whole point of a ban but most players see their behavior as "ok" without a ban.

Riot doesn't give a shit whether you are an angel or devil. They treat everyone the same regardless if you've been an angel for 10 years, and a devil for 1 hour. Best advice, suck it up, move on. Riot won't change their mind, they motta is "rules are rules". it's BS I know, but you gotta accept it, or find another game. good luck
